caseTitle: Ishtiaq Ahmed, Ex PS Supreme Court of Pakistan v. Hon'ble Competent Authority through its Registrar
tagline: Rule 13 of the Supreme Court (Appointment of Officers and Servants and Terms and Conditions of Service) Rules, 1982 (since repealed) and Rule 17 of the Supreme Court Establishment Service Rules, 2015, which barred an accused officer/staff member of the Supreme Court from being represented by a counsel before the Appellate Forum are not ultra vires the Constitution.
